value.name: Family of Tommy Le, killed by sheriff’s deputy, calls for death investigation to be included in state review
value.description: Le was fatally shot by a sheriff’s deputy after responding to reports of a man armed with a knife. Deputies discovered after the shooting that Le was carrying an ink pen, not a knife.

value.name: Tommy Le's family wants his death by King County deputies included in state probe of police killings
value.description: A state investigation on compliance with a voter-approved measure on police deadly use-of-force does not include Le's 2017 killing by King County deputies.

value.name: Tommy Le’s Family Lawyer Wants 2017 Murder Case Included in Statewide Investigation
value.description: The lawyer of Tommy Le’s family wants the 2017 murder case in Seattle to be included in a list of cases to be investigated by Attorney General Bob Ferguson against police officers who used deadly force.

video.name: Tommy Le’s Family Lawyer Wants 2017 Murder Case Included in Statewide Investigation

value.name: Family asks state to investigate killing of Burien student by sheriff’s deputy
value.description: The family of a Burien high school student, shot and killed by a King County Sheriff’s Deputy, is asking the Attorney General Bob Ferguson to do an independent investigation.

video.name: Family asks state to investigate killing of Burien student by sheriff’s deputy

value.name: Rantz: Director commented on dead man’s genitalia. Complaint swept under rug?
value.description: director Deborah Jacobs commented on the size of a deceased man’s genitalia at the Medical Examiner’s Office during the autopsy of 20-year-old Tommy Le. Jacobs currently faces an unrelated ...

value.name: Flight from Sea-Tac Airport returns after passenger becomes 'physically aggressive'
value.description: An Alaska Airlines flight from Sea-Tac Airport to Chicago returned to Sea-Tac after a passenger became aggressive and had to be subdued by the flight crew Saturday night. Alaska Airlines Flight ...
